def.dt: :a place or region beyond an enclosure or boundary: as
:the world beyond the confines of an institution (as a prison)
:the world beyond the territory or state of Alaska
:the 48 contiguous states
:the area farthest from a specified point of reference: as
:the side of home plate farthest from the batter
:the part of a playing area toward the sidelines
:the part of a playing area away from the goal
:an outer side or surface
:an outer manifestation :appearance
:the extreme limit of a guess :maximum the crowd numbered 10,000 at the outside
:of, relating to, or being on or toward the outer side or surface the outside edge
:of, relating to, or being on or toward the outer side of a curve or turn
:of, relating to, or being on or near the outside an outside pitch
:situated or performed outside a particular place
:connected with or giving access to the outside outside telephone line
:maximum
:not included or originating in a particular group or organization blamed the riot on outside agitators
:not belonging to one's regular occupation or duties outside interests
:barely possible :remote an outside chance
:made or done from the outside borrowed a basketball and practiced his outside shot
:on or to the outside
:outdoors

dt.un: used as a function word to indicate movement to or position on the outer side of

def.dt: :beyond the limits of outside the scope of this report outside the law
:except
:outside
:aside from
